columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the Mongo DB collection.

columns.name: account_name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the cosmosdb account in which the collection is created.

columns.name: database_name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the database in which the collection is created.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a Mongo DB collection uniquely.

columns.name: autoscale_settings_max_throughput
columns.description: Contains maximum throughput, the resource can scale up to.

columns.name: collection_etag
columns.description: A system generated property representing the resource etag required for optimistic concurrency control.

columns.name: collection_id
columns.description: Name of the Cosmos DB MongoDB collection.

columns.name: collection_rid
columns.description: A system generated unique identifier for collection.

columns.name: collection_ts
columns.description: A system generated property that denotes the last updated timestamp of the resource.

columns.name: shard_key
columns.description: A key-value pair of shard keys to be applied for the request.

columns.name: throughput
columns.description: Contains the value of the Cosmos DB resource throughput.

columns.name: throughput_settings
columns.description: Contains the Cosmos DB resource throughput or autoscaleSettings.
